ygData.subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice had wondered about the truth, now she knew. She mentally scanned the cave, she only found one mental signature. Psychically she focused a around the bot,

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ice had wondered about the truth, now she knew. She mentally scanned the
cave, she only found one mental signature. Psychically she focused a around
the bot, she found nothing to move, she continues forward toward the bot,
ready for any action he'd use against her. "What is your name and faction?"
she called out hoping Lunarpine would be there soon. (She knows he's close
so she's keeping her distance but she is close enough to attack if you'd
like.)

Lunarpine dug until the hole was big enough for his beast mode to slip
through. He transformed to wolf and crawled inside. Once inside he
transformed back to bot mode. Slowly and carefully he made his way through
the cave keeping  Grizzlotrons scent upwind of his. Like a wolf stalking an
elk he remained silent, ready to pounce at a moments notice. He tried to
telepathically reach Ice but her concentration was on the other bot.From:
Beast Wars <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 09, 2001 6:32 AM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron yells out to the Bot.  "Be careful there should be some one
else here.  He is the one who broke my leg, and he had some mines.  He left
me for dead about a hour ago but he still might be here."  Grizzltron wait
for Ice's shadow to fall on the wall in front of him.


OOC:  You should be Nice because it would be the nice thing to do :)
